DOC.brief_summary: This prospective equivalency study compare performance two Ophthalmic Cameras , Eyenez Retina Ophthalmic Camera v200 ( OC ) Optomed Smartscope M5 EY3 ( OP ) . Trained technician take picture patient ' retina quality photo evaluate . The study include healthy patient patient spectrum retinal disease . The study require technician take picture retina adult patient 18 80 year age use OC OP . The picture review compare central reader/Ophthalmologist , determine OC equivalent OP , base quality image
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Equivalency Validation Protocol Clinical Equivalency Eyenez Retina Camera v200 Optomed Smartscope M5 EY3
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects ( patient ) recruit via word mouth . The study duration approximately 1-2 week , assume recruitment rate 15 subject per week . The image record within 15 minute involve minimal disruption clinical workflow . In Study Environment set ( Foothill Medical Offices ) , User Interface evaluate compare retinal picture take subject device OC predicate device OP . Patient subject give Information Consent Form complete prior study The technician employ Foothill Eye Clinic operate device patient participant take retinal picture use OC . The technician use predicate device OP take retinal picture . The Ophthalmologist compare result picture take OC OP . The Ophthalmologist blind picture take camera record assessment quality picture . Patient subject receive standard care exam without dilation .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject Written Informed Consent Male female Age ≥ 18 year ≤80 year Normal Retina Healthy subject Glaucoma Limited Ability Agreement Spectrum retinal disease Subjects may expose retinal photography past 24 hour prior study visit plan retinal photography 24 hour study visit Diseased subject Written Informed Consent Male female Age ≥ 18 year ≤80 year Spectrum retinal disease Diseased subject Normal Retina Limited Ability Agreement Subjects may expose retinal photography past 24 hour prior study visit plan retinal photography 24 hour study visit
